weather_report:
As the night gently unwinds its embrace over Subiaco, the soft pitter-patter of light rain lingers in the mood, painting shadows of calm over the city streets. The rain, a whispering companion to the darkest hour, offers a nocturnal serenade not of disruptions but of delicate continuity. Still, the promise of dawn wraps itself around the earth's curve, and with it, the hope of clarity nudges at the edges of this damp canvas. Though slumber takes its precedence now, the heart can imagine the day ahead—a day woven with promises of reprieve beyond the expected twilight showers. The sunlight might play peek-a-boo as clouds parade across the sky, holding back their sunburst until later, perhaps.

In such weather, a wary soul might unfurl an umbrella from its slumber, ready to brave the possibility of a drizzle, but just as well they might not—and walk proudly resilient amidst nature's teasing caprices. Gentle layers, soft and comfortable, would complement the unending whispers of the rain, allowing a saunter down the lanes of life, shoulders light and spirits high. So as time gently tickles towards the daylight, a casual breakfast at a cozy café or a quiet hour spent in the enclave of a favorite book might guide you through this rhythm of release. As the clock betrays no urgency, the wise will let the world turn at its own pace, draped in the optimism of a day still yet to fully unfold.
